about_the_game:
Killer Night is an engaging psychological thriller in visual novel format that immerses players in a mysterious survival game. Set in a dark and isolated mansion, the participants must uncover the identity of a hidden killer among them. Every choice carries significant consequences, leading to different narrative paths and multiple endings.

With a plot full of tension and twists, Killer Night explores the complexities of moral decisions and interpersonal relationships. The game introduces a unique meta-narrative, where the line between reality and fiction gradually blurs, keeping players constantly on edge.

Players will not only have to survive but also reflect on their choices, with revelations that leave a lasting impact until the very last moment. Killer Night promises an interactive experience that maintains suspense, making each playthrough unique and unpredictable.

Key Features:

  • Psychological Thriller: An atmosphere full of tension and mystery that will keep you on edge from start to finish.

  • Compelling Storyline: Uncover an intricate plot with unexpected twists and shocking revelations until the very end.

  • Unique Characters: Each participant has a personal story and a reason for being there. Learn their secrets and decide who to trust.

  • Exploration and Clues: Discover hidden passages and gather crucial clues to uncover the identity of the killer.

  • Critical Decisions: Your choices will shape the course of the game and determine who lives and who dies.

content_descriptors.notes:
Killer Night contains scenes and themes that may not be suitable for all players. Mature content in the game includes:

Graphic Violence: The game features scenes of intense violence, including fighting, serious injuries, and killings. Some scenes show gory and bloody details.

Death and Murder: The plot involves the discovery of murders and the fight for survival. Players will witness life-or-death situations, with characters dying in violent ways.

These elements are an integral part of the plot and gameplay experience, and have been included to create an atmosphere of tension and suspense. Discretion is advised for players sensitive to these issues.

short_description: Killer Night is a psychological survival thriller where a group of death row inmates face extreme trials in an isolated mansion to gain freedom. Among them lies a ruthless killer. Will you be able to discover the killer's identity before it's too late?
